mapper.sql: order_delivery_detail_id , order_line_no , order_id , flow_id , order_detail_id , batch_number , delivery_product_count , delivery_status , import_file_url , remark , create_user , create_time , update_user , update_time , recieve_count , can_return_count

order_line_no , order_id , flow_id , order_detail_id , batch_number , delivery_product_count , delivery_status , import_file_url , remark , create_user , create_time , update_user , update_time , recieve_count , can_return_count

order_delivery_detail_id , order_line_no , order_id , flow_id , order_detail_id , batch_number , delivery_product_count , delivery_status , import_file_url , remark , create_user , date_format(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') create_time , update_user , date_format(update_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') update_time , recieve_count , can_return_count
mapper.select: SELECT count(1) AS totalcount FROM t_order_delivery_detail WHERE 1=1

SELECT ODD.order_delivery_detail_id,ODD.order_line_no,ODD.batch_number,ODD.delivery_product_count,OD.order_detail_id,OD.product_code,OD.product_name,OD.brand_name,OD.form_of_drug,OD.specification,OD.manufactures,OD.product_count,ODD.recieve_count,OD.short_name from t_order_delivery_detail ODD LEFT JOIN t_order_detail OD ON ODD.order_detail_id=OD.order_detail_id LEFT JOIN t_order_exception O ON O.exception_order_id=ODD.flow_id WHERE ODD.flow_id=#{flowId} AND O.cust_id=#{custId} AND ODD.delivery_status=1
